DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Use up all your stored Spell Effects and Spell Modifiers to cause effects. Additionally causes Scribed Spells to stop being added to your hand until another Spell Effect is played.
Purged from your hand at the end of your turn.
Adds an effect to your next spell. Additionally adds a Scribed Spell to your hand and at the start of every turn if you do not have one.
Modifies the effects of your next spell.
Lose 1 Energy at the start of your turn. At the start of each turn, drained is reduced by 1.
Your next spell will be X % more effective. ALL Spell Effects will be multiplied by X %.
Your next spell will cast X additional times.
Any and all instances of Spell Effect: Damage.
Echoes are copies of cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.
